Body: Date: Tue, 26 Nov 1996 00:38:41 GMT Server: NCSA/1.5 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Thu, 07 Mar 1996 22:02:54 GMT Content-length: 1528 SFU Database Systems Group SFU Database Systems Group Research in the area of database systems ranges from relational databases to distributed, intelligent, and heterogeneous data- and knowledge-bases, and their applications.
